attributes.action: keep Lincoln Theatre Royal's doors open, and maintain the culture of our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lincoln City Council has announced it will be cutting its funding to Lincoln Theatre Royal as it needs to cut £1.5 million a year on revenue expenditure by 2012. 

This means that the ONLY place for traditional theatre in Lincoln is to close it's door as soon as March 2009. 
Theartre Management have said "Come March, it will be boarded up", they added that they believe the council should continue to support the venue. 

We happen to agree with Theatre Management, and believe Lincoln City Council should continue to fund the theatre. 

£170 000 a year is all the theatre needs, it's not exactly much really is it?

Please help us Save Lincoln Theatre Royal

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep Lincoln Theatre Royal's doors open, and maintain the culture of our country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20502


Prime Minister's Office
